channel.title: MMINDI Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC Reunion/Birthday Weekend (July 13-17, 2017)
channel.description: MMINDI Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Weekend, July 13-17 site information, etc.

item.title: Who-Is-Coming
item.description: The Who Is Coming? page up HERE. If you're planning to come but haven't registered, get on it! Lisa will work out the payment with you for registration and if you've made a deposit deduct it from that.

item.title: Registration
item.description:
The Registration Form Is now open for the VA-DC 2017 MMINDI "Birthday" Reunion! (yay!) You can click on it here or on the link on the left side. Once we have some registrations, we'll start posting a list of who is going on the link below it.

Registration deadline June 25 (Sunday). Cancellations after the deadline will result in the loss of the registration fee.

Any issues or questions email us @MMINDIConnect or to @Lisa Thackston.

item.title: Accommodations
item.description:
Accommodations

The reunion has set a block of space at Hotel block: http://www.lorienhotelandspa.com with a link for reservation here for making the reservation online or you can use the phone number info below and say you want the "MMI/NDI Reunion" block.

The hotel is $169/night - they have a wine and cheese thing each evening and are a pet friendly hotel. You can request a pet-free/allergy-free room if needed at booking time. They have fitness 24 hours center, etc. Check out their FAQ. - John Q

Note: See addition details below from the hotel:

  • We offer valet (parking) only, which is $30 a night and allows as much in/out as your guest may need for no additional charge.
  • We offer complimentary wireless throughout the hotel as long as you are Kimpton Karma Member, which is in the link here. This will also give the chance to customize your stay (selecting pillow preferences, newspaper, and tons of other fun stuff!) and also gives you a $10 Raid the Mini Bar card. *note: $12.99 internet fee/24 hours for non-rewards members-JohnQ*
  • The reservations department is available 24 hours a day at 1-877-956-7436. All reservations should be made under the “MMI/NDI Reunion” in order to receive the group rate.

Again, the booking link is here and you can review the Kimpton Hotels Karma Rewards program here.

NOTE: Kimpton Lorien Hotel & Spa block deadline is June 15th.

Block rate: The price of the rooms are *$169.00 until the block is released and then whatever market rate is at the resort.

The hotel is exactly 0.4 miles ~9 min (walking distance - see this map!) to the HUB HOUSE! We STILL NEED DEPOSITS to make the HUB HOUSE HAPPEN!

Oh yea - you can see the walk from Hotel -> Metro:

item.title: Hub House - Need Deposits
item.description:
• Hub House Rental - click here to see house

To make this HAPPEN we need DEPOSITS NOW! We don't have it yet!
* your deposit will be deducted from your registration fee

  • You can deposit with Paypal here:

or you can send a check to sending a check to Lisa Thackston, 38 Forest Drive, Palmyra, Virginia 22963. Be sure to let her know lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com you're sending her a check so she can go ahead as quickly as possible.

  • Information: This is a house rental in Old Town Alexandria – this house becomes our “hub” for the weekend. There will be a couple organized events at this location; however, it will be available to hang out/meet up, etc. throughout the weekend. It is within walking distance to the metro (to go into DC), as well as lots of shopping, food, entertainment, etc.

We have, on first come, first served basis for spaces in the Hub House itself. Reserve with Lisa Thackston directly at lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com who is managing these:

  • There are 3 Queen Bedrooms, an attic media room with a futon (double/queen) and then a pullout sofa in the Living Room.
    • Prices as follows:
      1 Room left: $120/night for the Queen Bedrooms
      $100/night for the Attic Media Room taken
      $75/night for the sofa bed in the Living Room

item.title: Draft Agenda
item.description:
The Registration Link is Up! Go get registered! Updated agenda below.

*subject to change - 2017.04.01

Tentative Schedule

Additional Details and Costs to be added as they become available.

  • As the planning of this event is in progress we’d like to ask for a $50 deposit to indicate that you plan to attend. The $50 will be deducted from your total registration. Payment can be made through PalPay to mmindi2015@gmail.com or sending a check to Lisa Thackston, 38 Forest Drive, Palmyra, Virginia 22963. This will be a family friendly event – with each event include kids if you’d like (and as you indicate they are attending). Saturday evening there will be babysitting offered during the dinner party. Please let us know if you plan to bring your family (in registration form there will be a place for this). There will be reduced costs for kids attending. Associated costs (for your planning) listed below but would/could include: travel, hotel (or house), registration fee, Friday night reception, Saturday dinner party/cash bar, Sunday BBQ, and Monday morning farewell bagels/coffee… Plus, additional things you/your family might like to do while in the area.

  • Anyone interested in helping with the planning, organizing, set-up, etc. please contact Lisa Thackston at lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com.

  • A breakdown of anticipated fees, costs and plans are currently:

    • Registration $35 / Graduate
    • Lodging: on your own, or hotel block $169/nite - deadline June 15, or in hub house
      -- Hub House rooms - one queen room left! Contact Lisa directly!
    • Thursday: Afternoon can checkin at Hub House.
    • Friday: 6-10p Meet & Greet $30 adults/food/drinks, Kids (over 5yrs/under 16) $10
    • Saturday: 6pm Buffet Dinner $90 @ Landini Brothers Italian Restaurant includes gratuity and tax. Will have cash bar.
      -- note: working on kids prices for Dinner small kid plates ~$10?
      -- Sitting available at hub house.
    • Sunday: Afternoon BBQ $25 Adults/$10 Kids under 16yr/under 5yr & Free
    • Monday: morning Coffee/Bagels $5 Adults / Kids Free

  • FYI
    -- deposit deducted from registration total
    -- There will babysitting available at the hub house - and the kids can eat there...

Timeline Breakdown

Thursday, July 13th

  • Check-in to the hub house in Old Town Alexandria – this house becomes our “hub” for the weekend. There will be a couple organized events at this location; however, it will be available to hang out/meet up, etc. throughout the weekend. It is within walking distance to the metro (to go into DC), as well as lots of shopping, food, entertainment, etc.

  • The “hub” house has availability for some overnight guests. We have one queen left! Contact Lisa directly for it.

  • Hotel: Accomodations Now Here! this is block of rooms within walking distance of the "hub" house and Metro.

Friday, July 14th, 6:00pm -- 10:00pm
  • Meet & Greet Reception at the “hub” house - heavy appetizers/beer/wine/soda
    We can plan some specific local activities during the morning/day if folks would like – or they can do things on their own.
Saturday, July 15th, 6:00pm
  • Dinner at local Landini Brothers Italian Restaurant - babysitting would be offered at the “hub” house.
    We can plan some specific local activities during the morning/day if folks would like – or they can do things on their own.
Sunday, July 16th
  • Afternoon BBQ – at the “hub” house
Monday, July 17th
  • Fairly early morning coffee/bagels at the “hub” house

item.title: Announcement MMINDI VA-DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Event
item.description:
To be held in Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC, on July 13-17...

Hello Fellow MMI & NDI Classmates (of all years!),

Earlier this year we asked if you were interested in a 2017 Reunion/Birthday Bash (for many turning 50!) – we got a great response of interest. We asked where, when, and a couple other planning questions. We ran with the feedback we got –and then – Nothing.

So, flying with some feedback we did get - we found a Victorian Mansion to possibly host the reunion in; however, we had to let it go without enough commitment (clock was ticking on that reservation).

So we've settled on trying for a smaller 'hub' house that a few folks can stay in and the rest of us at some nearby hotel(s) that we're working on block reservations on.

To make this happen we need your donations while we secure the house and we get the rest of the details ironed out (VERY SOON - already IN PROGRESS!)

See our links for Tentative Schedule with Friday Meet & Greet, Saturday Dinner Plans, Sunday BBQ, and last Monday morning hangout! Plenty of things and places to go while we catchup and visit!
